content:
System.Data.Services.BuildProvider Namespace

Definition

Classes in this namespace generate C# or Visual Basic code for a WCF Data Services client application based on the metadata returned by the data service.

In this Article

Classes

DataServiceBuildProvider

Generates C# or Visual Basic code for a WCF Data Services client application based on the metadata returned by the data service.
